cclsp.description: TypeScript LSP - code intelligence, go-to-definition, find references

next-devtools.description: Next.js DevTools - route info, build status, server actions

playwright.description: Browser automation - E2E testing, screenshots, page interactions

vitest.description: Test runner - run tests, coverage, watch mode

github.description: GitHub operations - PRs, issues, repos, code search

context7.description: Live documentation lookup - prevents hallucinated APIs

memory.description: Persistent memory - remember context across sessions

instructions: 1. Copy the servers you need to your ~/.claude.json mcpServers section
2. Replace ${VAR} placeholders with actual values or set environment variables
3. Required servers should be enabled for full react-basecamp functionality
4. Keep under 10 MCPs enabled to preserve context window
quick_setup: claude mcp add cclsp -- npx cclsp
claude mcp add next-devtools -- npx -y next-devtools-mcp@latest
claude mcp add vitest -- npx vitest-mcp

project_overrides.description: Add these to .claude.json in project root to disable per-project
